short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat interface for your local Ollama AI models. Requires Ollama to be installed and running on localhost.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that provides a chat interface for your local Ollama AI models. Requires Ollama to be installed and running on your computer.
